article.title: In Photos: Crime Scenes at IV Deli Mart and 6500 Block of Del Playa
article.description: Nexus photographer John Clow captured images from two of the biggest crime scenes of the mass shooting spree in Isla Vista: at IV Deli Mart on Pardall Rd, and on the 6500 block of Del Playa drive, whe...
article.content:
Nexus photographer John Clow captured images from two of the biggest crime scenes of the mass shooting spree in Isla Vista: at IV Deli Mart on Pardall Rd, and on the 6500 block of Del Playa drive, where the shooting suspect Elliot Rodger shot himself to death to end the chase.

All photos by John Clow/Daily Nexus.












Print
Daily Nexus Photography

A cool team of photographers who preserves the visual memory of UCSB and Isla Vista.

The photo editor can be reached at photo@dailynexus.com.

related.title: In Photos: Students Protest Napolitano’s Visit to UCSB Campus
related.content:
Students protesting against UC President Janet Napolitano march by the Student Resource Building during Napolitano’s visit to UCSB on November 21, 2013. Cameryn Brock/Daily Nexus

Chancellor Yang explains why there will be no public forum with Napolitano to a crowd of student protesters outside the faculty club. John Clow/Daily Nexus

Student protesters gathered near the faculty club. Protesters voiced concerns with Napolitano’s track record of deportation as U.S. Homeland Security Chief. The UC President will hold a closed meeting with student leaders on campus tomorrow. John Clow/Daily Nexus

Unfazed by the crowd of protesters, a police officer stands guard during UC President Janet Napolitano’s visit to UCSB. Cameryn Brock/Daily Nexus

UCPD officers form a barrier against students protesters. John Clow/Daily Nexus
